snippet: Accounts on state television did not specify whether the military had fired any weapons capable of carrying a nuclear warhead, which would violate a U.N. resolution.
abstract: Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps of Iran reportedly stages large-scale ballistic missile tests; remains unclear whether ballistic missiles capable of carrying nuclear warhead were tested.
lead_paragraph: Accounts on state television did not specify whether the military had fired any weapons capable of carrying a nuclear warhead, which would violate a U.N. resolution.

headline.main: Iranian Unit Tests Missiles, Accusing U.S. of Threats
headline.print_headline: Iranian Unit Tests Missiles, Accusing U.S. of Threats
